rows.title: Soil Health
rows.message_text: Healthy soil is the foundation of productive and sustainable food production. Learn here about the principles of soil health and usable best practices.

rows.title: Pest Control
rows.message_text: Did you know that we have beneficial pests? Learn more about managing pests through agricultural practices such as plant diversity, and efficient use of non-toxic pesticides.

rows.title: Nutrition
rows.message_text: Nutrition is a critical part of health and development. Explore this category to learn more about the different food types and nutrients that are necessary for you and your family.
